column4: on 6.10 what linux/kernel package do I need to install to get 686 and SMP support? I have linux-image-generic installed but Im not getting smp support. thanks.
how have you determined that you have no SMP support?
I've never seen one of those on a USB device -- only mini PCI.
you are most likely right. ive only seen them in pcmci and mini pci
